snippet: President Obama plans to sign an executive order banning federal contractors from discriminating against employees on the basis of their sexual orientation or gender identity.
abstract: Pres Obama plans to sign executive order banning contractors from discriminating against employees on the basis of their sexual orientation or gender identity.
lead_paragraph: President Obama plans to sign an executive order banning federal contractors from discriminating against employees on the basis of their sexual orientation or gender identity.

headline.main: Obama to Sign Protections for Contractors’ Gay Employees
headline.print_headline: Obama to Sign Protections for Contractors’ Gay Employees
